name: Jota+ Drive ConnectorV2
description: Jota+ Drive Connector is a plugin to connect Jota+ with Drive.  === V2 version is better performance than V1 version!! ===  Install this plugin then you can activate the connectivity to Drive of Jota+.  This app only connect to Drive server.  ---------------------------- This app needs Jota+ and Jota+PRO-KEY.  ---------------------------- Caution: You CANT edit Docs files.  ---------------------------- How to use connector. - Touch Open on the toolbar then file browser will open. - Click Hamburger icon on the top-left corner then click Settings-Storage. - Select one which you want and install a connector. - Log in to the connector. - Again open the drawer. - Click the name of the connector. - Browse directory on the file system. - Open a file.  Shouldnt use official Drive app to use this app.
